p.span: InformaciÃ³n sobre rutas de distribuciÃ³n de almuerzos

a.span: Click here to go to information for the Online Instructional Website

a.style: text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

a.span: Haga clic aquÃ­ para ir a la informaciÃ³n del sitio web de instrucciÃ³n en lÃ­nea

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Many students will be accessing information provided to them by teachers from email, Google Classroom, or Seesaw

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

em.span: Muchos estudiantes accederÃ¡n a la informaciÃ³n que les proporcionan los maestros por correo electrÃ³nico, Google Classroom o Seesaw

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: All support is available from 8:00 am to 3:00 pm Monday through Friday.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We will do our best to respond to needs, but due to the unique environment of home support, there may be times where we can not resolve home-specific support requests.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Todo el soporte es de 8:00 am a 3:00 pm de lunes a viernes.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Haremos nuestro mejor esfuerzo para responder a las necesidades, pero debido al ambiente Ãºnico de ayuda a domicilio, puede haber ocasiones eran no podemos resolver las solicitudes de apoyo en el hogar especÃ­ficos.

br.div: If you are in need of a replacement device, or a chromebook for your home to support OID, then you can come to the Copeland Middle School on Monday from 11am to 1pm, and a Technician will be on site to provide you with a device.Â Please observe social distancing guidelines allowing for 6 feet of space between you and others, when arriving to the school (especially if a line is forming to pick up devices).

Si necesita un dispositivo de reemplazo o un Chromebook de manera que su hogar tenga opciÃ³n para OID, puede venir a la Escuela Intermedia Copeland los martes y jueves de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m., y un tÃ©cnico estarÃ¡ en el lugar para proporcionarle un Chromebook. Tenga en cuenta las pautas de distanciamiento social que permiten 6 'de espacio entre usted y los demÃ¡s, al llegar a la escuela.(especialmente si se estÃ¡ formando una fila para recoger Chromebooks).

br.p: Below is information provided by highspeedinternet.com on how you can get access to internet at your home if you are in need.Â As it mentions, please be aware that not all services are available in all areas, and all connections will be subject to some limitations on service availability.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 35px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

h2.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 0.5rem; padding: 0px; font-weight: 500; color: inherit; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; line-height: 1.3; font-size: 2.25rem;

div.h2: Can I get no-cost internet during the COVID-19 outbreak?

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

div.p: You can get no-cost, in-home internet for up to two months during the new coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak if you qualify for certain low-income internet programs or have a student living in your household. Hereâs a list of the internet providers offering limited, no-cost internet services during the outbreak.

div.p: Every internet provider that has signed theÂ Keep Americans Connected PledgeÂ has also opened up their Wi-Fi hotspots for free public use.

p.span: A continuaciÃ³n encontrarÃ¡ informaciÃ³n proporcionada por highspeedinternet.com sobre cÃ³mo puede obtener acceso a Internet en su hogar si lo necesita. Como se menciona, tenga en cuenta que no todos los servicios estÃ¡n disponibles en todas las Ã¡reas, y todas las conexiones estarÃ¡n sujetas a algunas limitaciones en la disponibilidad del servicio.

h2.span: Puedo obtener internet sin costo durante el brote de COVID-19?

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

div.p: Puede obtener Internet sin costo en el hogar por hasta dos meses durante el nuevo brote de coronavirus (COVID-19) si califica para ciertos programas de internet de bajos ingresos o si un estudiante vive en su hogar.Â AquÃ­ hay una lista de los proveedores de internet que ofrecen servicios de internet limitados y sin costo durante el brote.
